title: Mac- League of legends quit unexpectedly     High Sierra  10.13.1
body:
Is there someone has the same issue? 
I just updated my Mac to 10.13.1  macOS High Sierra.
My csgo works badly and my lol quit unexpectedly !! 
someone can help me ??

replies.body:
My client has crashed nearly every game I play. It is super irritating.
I'm using OS 10.3.2 High Sierra, and riot needs to address this immediately. It's completely ridiculous and unfair. 
I'm not submitting a ticket for this; it's very simple, one second I'm in game, and the next the game screen is completely gone and I'm staring at the client screen on my desktop, and have to reconnect. Look into it.

I'm on High Sierra 10.13.3 and I got about 7-8 bugsplats in about 2 hours of play (5-6 games roughly). It's weird because it seems to happen more often early in the game. Very often the first engagement will cause a bugsplat and then it'll be ok for the rest of the game. However, I did have one game last night where it crashed 4-5 times though. Very frustrating since it's been months from the time this has been reported.
Hey, we'd like to take a closer look into this with you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can investigate further and help out.

I followed your advice and submitted a support ticket (EUW).

I pointed out that a quick board search shows that there are many people across all regions suffering from this issue, and that I am more than willing to help debug and provide logs.
The first response was a generic link to the hexatech repair tool, which I did, and submitted logs when the problem persisted. Rather than any response to the logs, my ticket was closed.
When the problem continued, I opened another ticket, restating that I'm wanting to help resolve the issue.
The response was less than satisfactory:

> Hey there,

> As mentioned by my colleague, the only solution at the moment is to downgrade from High Sierra. If the issue still occurs after downgrading,  please let me know.

> Best regards,

> SunNamida
> Riot Games Player Support Specialist

> "I got this."


I'm a software developer, and downgrading the OS is not an option for me. For others it's an incredible inconvenience and security risk.
This is pretty bad on Riot's behalf. I am also having this issue and they do not seem to be supporting the macOS users. Very disappointing to say the least.
same problem here, 3 bugs plat around 1mn when i'm in game
same bro. I even want to crash my computer tho.
It's been 4 months and still you did not fix it. Hmm
Hello? "about a month ago?" Can you hear me ?! hello ?! IS ANYONE THERE ?! High sierra came out in september? You had 3 months since then? Holy $#%%ing ####

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AwAZytsH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-10T22:42:10.922+0000)
>
> Hey, we'd like to take a closer look into this with you.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can investigate further and help out.

replying to this 3 month old comment. do not bother sending a report ticket guys, there is no point. 

i had this exact issue (1-5 mins, crash, reconnect, fine) the day i installed high sierra. tried it for a week, did the whole support ticket > hex tech > full restore etc. nothing worked. 

eventually downgrade to el capitan, zero issues for the last 3 months. 

"upgraded" last night, had the issue in 4/5 games. 

I'm going to make this clear: 
**THERE IS NO WORKAROUND OR SOLUTION TO THIS OTHER THAN DOWNGRADING YOUR OS.**

sadly this a convoluted and time consuming process, especially if you want to go pre-sierra (let alone high-sierra) altogether.

This is really sad riot, truly.... I just bought a new laptop due to my needs of one and was looking to play league on my mac after playing casually since season 2. Love your game from the windows side, but on the mac side there is no support and like others your .dmg file won't even download onto my new laptop. Disappointing riot that you truly only support windows users!
Problems still up , yesterday crashed 3 times in the same game as malphite ...
Honestly it’s insane how long it has taken Riot to fix this issue. I’ve spent countless hours and money on this game, I’d hate to leave but this bug is making it unplayable

> [{quoted}](name=Mother Fricker,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AwAZytsH,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2018-01-04T18:06:12.039+0000)
>
> Honestly it’s insane how long it has taken Riot to fix this issue. I’ve spent countless hours and money on this game, I’d hate to leave but this bug is making it unplayable

ive been playing this game for about 5 years. And I stopped playing about a month ago because of this problem. I submitted multiple tickets and got no response, so fk it lol
Has this been resolved yet? I've had this issue for several months.. are they really not going to do ANYTHING? Makes this game unplayable.

I'm having the same exact issue. My client crashes almost every game, sometimes multiple times a game.  I'm running OS 10.3.2 and I have repaired my League client several times with no affect.  It is extremely irritating, please address.

I have the same problem now for more then four months. Sometimes I can't play the game properly because I crash multiple times. For me it too happens mostly in the early parts of the game.
MacMauri

hello everyone,

I have been sending emails to riot the past 3 months regarding this issue but still they havent informed me if they are working to resolve it.

The only information that I got, was that as soon as they fix it we will be informed by the patch notes!
Still going on... Come on riot - fix your game, you have money to do it!
They have money , but will they fix it? It's been 4 months approx. To be honest, do they even care ?
I have the same issue and i often get worried I will get a penalty for it plz help!

I've had this issue for about 4 months now, and literally EVERY SINGLE GAME I've played, I get a bug splat-- more often on 5's map than ARAM. I have sent in 3 tickets to Riot about these issues, and they have yet to get back to me. The only thing I've found that somewhat helps backfire the issues is once you get into game, IMMEDIATELY exit the game and reconnect. The bug splats still happen every now and again after this process, but it still helps. I have uninstalled/reinstalled League, done the Hextech repair tool, and did the full repair through the client itself and hasn't change a thing. I've been playing this game since the beta, and spent well over $1,000 on Riot, yet they aren't doing jack for Mac users? #Priorities #AmIRite

I’ve played multiple ranked games with this issue the enemy team kills me for free every time freelo anyone? Vs me in game you will climb I don’t even play anymore because of this nothing you can do to prevent this crashing I’ve tried all the steps you’ve listed this game is absolutely horrible since os high Sierra’s release

Funny thing is, this only happens to me when a skirmish between 1 - 5 minutes in both ranked and normal draft pick. This is an issue that needs to be fixed, via a legit fix and not a system downgrade. It simply isn't fair for someone who uses an application that requires the latest updates for their Mac.

Having this same issue. The most crashes I've had in a single game was 4 in a ranked game. Needless to say, it was not a fun experience for me OR my teammates. 

Hoping this will get fixed asap.
Same issue. 10.13.2. Unexpectedly quits. No issue with Internet or any other application. Perfect timing for beginning of new season.
same here with High Sierra
Hey, I have the same problem. Since I upgrade to High Os Sierra the game quit unexpectedly. Please fix it.
same issue here, pls fix!! :(
i am having same issue here! do something riot
Same issue here.
I'm also having this issue, I've had four unexpected crashes in the last 3 games
Same issue here. I have encountered crashed since i updated macOS. It happened every single game.

Same issue. Been going on for the past few months (probably when this thread started) and I'm on High Sierra. Really frustrating. Was hoping for diamond last season but literally couldn't play ranked because of the bugsplats. Pisses me off that I spent so much time and money on the game for them to not fix it.

Having this problem since upgrade to high sierra too. I issued tickets, looked at crash logs etc. It appears to be a bug in the way high sierra handle graphic instruction (no directX on mac, mostly OpenGL or Metal used). Riot can't do a lot about it and apple don't seems too be willing to do something. Downgrade is the simplest solution but it is also risky. Another solution is to boot windows on your mac if you have enough place. Apple made it simple enough with bootcamp.

How is this issue not yet fixed?!!!!

IS ANYONE LISTENING?
''at the moment'' so in the future it will be worked out..??  (next update?) {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I have the same issue, please help
Same issue. Crashes every other game, typically around 2-4 minutes in, but occasionally later.

> [{quoted}](name=PikachuVV,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AwAZytsH,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-10T22:01:27.812+0000)
>
> Is there someone has the same issue? 
> I just updated my Mac to 10.13.1  macOS High Sierra.
> My csgo works badly and my lol quit unexpectedly !! 
> someone can help me ??

Same problems happened to me too. The highest crash time like 3 times in one game. Don't know how to fix it. Anyone has any idea about it? Thank you.
Can someone give me the green light when its working? I didnt upgrade to high sierra yet. (i hope someone from riot can explain this bug)

Exactly same issue here!  After I updated to Mac High Sierra, the client always crashed and asked me report the bug and reconnect it. This event has happened two months, but I never saw Riot or someone try to fix this. Majority people use Windows, Minor use Mac, so Riot ignores the issue accidentally or purposely?!
Me too! Someone helps!
I am having the exact same problem as Mascerano.
So.... i dont have to upgrade to high sierra for couple of months? I have seen this problem more often on forums, for the past 5 months.

> [{quoted}](name=PikachuVV,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=AwAZytsH,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-11-10T22:01:27.812+0000)
>
> Is there someone has the same issue? 
> I just updated my Mac to 10.13.1  macOS High Sierra.
> My csgo works badly and my lol quit unexpectedly !! 
> someone can help me ??

Same issue with me too. I thought it was my internet issue since the client showed reconnect screen everytime it crashed. But, my internet works fine with all the other stuff. I think its the compatibility issue with the new mac OS High Sierra.
Hey! I lowered my game graphics from medium high to medium and haven't had the issue for about 10 games now. Don't know if it is just luck or if it is actually resolved

replies.poster: F L 0 R A L S
replies.body: This game keeps fucking crashing riot fix it. I left my last match cuz its unplayable. Wasted money buying skins and u cant fix ur shit

Client just crashed 3 times in a row after the 4th minute mark here, ruined a totally winnable lane, and of course since I play in low elo, the jungler didn't even consider the idea of helping us. I actually just thought about it: I have been having this issue for months, but I can't recall a single time the client crashed while I was in any other lane but bot, as adc or support. It's really weird. But it's frustrating, RIOT knows we Mac players have been having these issues and they are not looking into them. They're doing nothing. 
I am so tired of this, I like playing this game with my friends, but when this happens (and today for the first time ever it crashed THREE TIMES in a row, I crashed, died, came back to lane, aa a minion, crashed, walked back to spawn until I reconnected, walked back to lane, aa a minion, crashed, died) I get so frustrated I bark at my friends even though they have no fault. I really wanted to quit the game but RIOT penalises people for doing that. Such a joke. So I was stuck in a game where my teammates wouldn't even ff. I just had to sit there and watch the world burn. Is this what you guys mean with 'having fun' in this game?
